channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hello I'm Mr Frog
item.description:
23yo almost software engineer with weird and goofy humor. Not a native English speaking trying to write coherent and comprehensives articles about my Java/Spring Framework experiments.

Plus, it’s nice to have a blog for the sake of freedom of expression — even if I don’t really have much to say. LinkedIn is so cringe for writing and expressing my ideas.

My greatest achievement since i started at programming(and probably in my life so far): I fixed a typo in Spring Modulith: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-modulith/releases
